newsitem.title: USA: PC Quote hires new auditors.
newsitem.headline: PC Quote hires new auditors.

text.p: PC Quote Inc said Tuesday it appointed KPMG Peat Marwick LLP as the company's auditing firm, effective immediately.
PC Quote provides on-line stock and market quotes to financial professionals, consumers and redistributors.

Last month, PC Quote's independent auditors McGladrey & Pullen LLP declined to stand for re-election. In early April, PC Quote said that its auditors had raised doubts about the company's ability to continue as a going concern due to significant operating losses.
And in February, PC Quote hired an investment bank, William Blair & Co, to help the company explore a possible sale, merger, joint venture or other business alternatives.
Shares of PC Quote closed at 1-12/16 yesterday.
